resources.string:
DealMe is an online deal finder and browser that will help you find great deals on items you are shopping for.

How To's

Favorites

Browse: You can browse deals that you have saved to your favorites by pressing menu then favorites.
Add: Press the blue star when viewing an item to add to favorites.
Remove: Press the red x when viewing an item to remove a favorite. 
 
 Notifications

You can choose to be notified when a sub-category is updated. To subscribe for notifications press and hold a sub-category until a menu with a checkbox pops up. Here you can choose to be notified.


More info at dealmeandroid.blogspot.com
